description: A man floats in an inner tube on the ocean surface, his legs dangling below, as several large sharks gather beneath him. The sharks, typically seen as relentless predators, are depicted with human-like consciousness regarding their potential meal's nutritional value. One shark expresses hesitation about consuming the man, citing concerns about high cholesterol. This introduces dark humor and irony by applying modern dietary anxieties to a primal predatory scenario. The absurd situation underscores a humorous subversion of natural instincts.
caption: “I’m tempted, but it looks really high in cholesterol.”
